articles.author: Shyam Vasudevan
articles.title: Asian Kabaddi Championships, India vs Iran: Shadlou's rookie error sees India defend title - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: India remained unbeaten throughout the tournament, a good sign ahead of the Asian Games later this year.
articles.content: In the end, it was all about Mohammadreza Shadlou. Iran's captain turned hero to villain as a rookie error saw India beat Iran 42-32 and defend their Asian Kabaddi Championships title in Busan on Thu… [+3719 chars]
